about_the_game:
"The Yard of Solace." is an exploration and life-simulation story-based adventure game.

Experience the girl's life and growth across four seasons in an underground sanatorium. Through your choices and actions, witness the different futures that unfold for her.

Experience the Story

"Everything will come to pass as it should."

As the war nears its end, Dr. Isabella is sent away from the frontlines under the protection of her family to an underground sanatorium meant to shelter important individuals.

Disconnected from the frontlines and overwhelmed by despair, she unexpectedly reunites with a girl she had met once before.

The blind girl, wandering alone in this desolate place, is physically unharmed but suffers from severe memory loss, remembering only the doctor’s name.

A doctor who has witnessed countless deaths and a child who has miraculously survived now rely on each other, living together in quiet harmony. Alongside two other familiar companions, they spend their days reading, exploring the new environment, listening to music and the sounds of nature, and occasionally sharing stories of the past, offerings to the slumbering Creator of the Earth.

The girl’s future will be shaped during this tranquil year...

Key Features

  • Enhance the protagonist’s abilities—Hearing, Touch, Knowledge, and Intuition—through various daytime activities, unlocking more choices and opportunities.

  • At night, delve into dreams to hear messages from mysterious stone tablets, revealing glimpses of the past and the future.

  • Collect "Words" scattered throughout the world to restore the Creator of the Earth’s power. These may also provide vital insights.

  • Rest assured, no matter what happens, she will survive safely. But if you wish to unravel the lingering fog of mystery, uncover a certain secret and embrace it.
